scripts.create:mainnet: graph create --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 -- physica/launchpad subgraph-mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 -- vbstreetz/witswap-staking subgraph-mainnet.yaml
